repository.corpname: Washington State University Libraries, Manuscripts, Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Preliminary Guide to the Donald Greenaway Papers
did.abstract: This collection contains papers of Dr. Donald Greenaway, a Professor in the Department of Hotel and Restaurant Administration at Washington State University.

bioghist.p: Dr. Donald Greenaway was a Professor in the Department of Hotel and Restaurant Administration at Washington State University. He authored publications about the hotel and restaurant industry, as well as the related subjects of marketing and tourism. He later served as the Director of the Hotel and Restaurant Administration Program and Distinguished Professor Emeritus. In 1981, he received the Howard B. Meek Award from the International Council on Hotel, Restaurant, and Institutional Education.

scopecontent.p: This collection contains papers of Dr. Donald Greenaway, a Professor in the Department of Hotel and Restaurant Administration at Washington State University. The collection includes papers related to his research and teaching, presentations and writings about hotel and restaurant management and marketing (some by Greenaway, and others by unidentified authors), materials related to the National Restaurant Association, and published conference proceedings.

arrangement.p: This is an unprocessed collection. Any arrangement reflects either a pre-existing order from the records' creators or previous custodians, or preliminary sorting performed by staff.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

prefercite.p: Preliminary Guide to the Donald Greenaway Papers, circa 1940-1985 (MS.1985.29)
Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries, Pullman, WA.

acqinfo.p: Donald Greenaway donated this collection to the Washington State University Libraries in 1985 (MS.1985.29).

separatedmaterial.p: Original Accession Records indicates that several books of books were separated from this collection.

relatedmaterial.p: WSU Centennial Oral Histories, 1982-1988 (Archives 202): Donald Greenaway interview.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
